ygData.subject: Re: Someone PLEASE tell me why....
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I have a different take on this.  I rather like that some zones are remote and thus few people go to visit because of the potentially long downtime if
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, 12 Jul 1999 silky@... wrote:
>
> I KNOW why only some classes can bind - and I have no problem with that,
> even though ours is not one of them, that is not the question.
>
> What I want to know is WHY can't someone bind me anywhere THEY can be bound?
>
> Again, I don't mind so much not being able to bind MYSELF - but if that
> magic user can bind HIMSELF there, why can't he bind me?

I have a different take on this. I rather like that some
zones are "remote" and thus few people go to visit because of
the potentially long downtime if they get killed. Instead of
melee classes being allowed to bind anywhere, I think pure
casting classes should only be allowed to be bound in cities,
like melee classes. :-)

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
